Tu (ethnic group)/surname Tu

sentences.english: The Oedipus business comes nearer to home.
sentences.chinese: 伊迪帕斯在朝家的方向走。

sentences.english: We'll be late for the meeting if we stay any longer.
sentences.chinese: 再不走我們開會就要遲到了。

sentences.english: He came in, holding a cigarette between his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他嘴上叨着香菸走了進來。

sentences.english: One day, Einstein was walking in a street in New Youk.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，愛因斯坦走在紐約的大街上。

sentences.english: They opened the door and the four men alighted .
sentences.chinese: 他們打開車門，四個人都走了出來。

sentences.english: When the chicken crow, follow the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 雞叫的時候，你就跟着雞走。

sentences.english: Dumbledore took Harry in his arms and turned toward the Dursleys' house.
sentences.chinese: 鄧布利多把哈利抱在懷裏，朝德思禮家走去。

sentences.english: Keyes, however, was on foot at the back of the parade.
sentences.chinese: 然而，凱斯走在遊行隊伍的最後面。

sentences.english: The poor old man plods along, hardly able to lift each food.
sentences.chinese: 這可憐白勺白叟喫力地走着，幾乎都擡不動腳了。

sentences.english: They decided to take the path of self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定走自力更生的道路。

sentences.english: There is nothing like a long walk to arouse the appetite.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比走很長的路更能激起食慾的了。

sentences.english: He was in such a hurry to get out that he barged into a passer-by.
sentences.chinese: 他急急忙忙地往外走，竟與一位行人撞了個滿懷。

sentences.english: Now, Mr. Martin is on the 10 floor. The attendant comes to meet Mr. Matin.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁先生到了十樓，服務員走過來迎接他。

sentences.english: I believe there is no way out of this forest.
sentences.chinese: 我相信沒有戮由以從這森林走出去。

sentences.english: You are my life away a never-ending road.
sentences.chinese: 你是我一生走不完的路。

sentences.english: If love told me walked to down I'll spell to love go end.
sentences.chinese: 如果愛告訴我走下去我會拼到愛盡頭。
